DevMux

Revolutionize your development workflow with an AI-powered platform that seamlessly integrates system design, coding, and team communication.

The Ultimate Platform for Developers

Real-Time Coding & Collaboration

Code, collaborate, and innovate seamlessly with real-time updates and cutting-edge tools designed for teams.

What Exactly is DevMux ?

Features & Demo

We provide a wide range of features to help you build your project.

Intuitive Project Management

Streamline your workflow with our intelligent issue tracking and management system, designed to boost team productivity.

Seamless Communication

Connect instantly with built-in video conferencing and real-time chat, breaking down communication barriers across teams.

DevMux Explained

A comprehensive platform that revolutionizes team collaboration, project management, and deployment workflows.

LLM Powered

Our platform leverages the power of LLMs to provide you with the best possible experience.

It takes just one click

Experience Devmux in just one click

Real-Time Devlopment

Develop your project in real-time with our seamless development workflow from any corner of the world.

Pricing Ranges

We provide a wide range of Pricing Plans for different use cases

Basic

Perfect for individuals and startups

$0/month
  • 1 User Account
  • Basic Feature Access
  • Community Support
  • Email Notifications

Pro

Ideal for growing teams and businesses

$15/month
  • 5 User Accounts
  • Advanced Features
  • Priority Email Support
  • Weekly Analytics

Enterprise

Custom solution for large organizations

Custom
  • Unlimited User Accounts
  • Full Feature Access
  • 24/7 Dedicated Support
  • Custom Integrations
